summary.span: 描述服務，此服務可以傳回正在剖析之標記的根物件。

span.span: Describes a service that can return the root object of markup being parsed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 服務是主要與由特定架構或架構中常用根項目類別的功能所公開的應用程式服務。The service is mainly relevant to application services that are exposed by a particular framework or by capabilities of a commonly-used root element class in a framework. 類型轉換器和標記延伸可以查詢XAML 物件寫入器叫用的值轉換行為時，會將 XAML 物件寫入器所提供的服務內容上以服務。Type converters and markup extensions can query for as a service on the service context that is provided by a XAML object writer, when the XAML object writer invokes value conversion behavior. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[類型轉換器和 XAML 的標記延伸](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/type-converters-and-markup-extensions-for-xaml.md)和[適用於類型轉換器和標記延伸](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/service-contexts-available-to-type-converters-and-markup-extensions.md)。For more information, see [Type Converters and Markup Extensions for XAML](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/type-converters-and-markup-extensions-for-xaml.md) and [Service Contexts Available to Type Converters and Markup Extensions](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/service-contexts-available-to-type-converters-and-markup-extensions.md).

summary.span: 從標記或從物件圖形取得根物件。

span.span: Gets the root object from markup or from an object graph.

remarks.format: ## Remarks XAML 標記案例中的根物件可能適用於標記延伸案例，因為可能會依照慣例將 XAML 標記根層級的屬性。The root object in a XAML markup scenario might be useful for markup extension scenarios because of attributes that might by convention be set at the root level of XAML markup. 架構可能會指定特定的根物件的功能。Specific root object capabilities might be specified by frameworks. 例如，某些屬性可能只是有效根層級，或架構可能會支援從根目錄的全域屬性的繼承。For example, certain attributes might only be valid at the root level, or a framework might support inheritance of global properties from the root.
